alert.note: Alert for Pryor, Northern Bighorn Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 25 at 1:24AM MST until January 28 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MST THURSDAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, additional snow accumulations between 3 and 6 inches. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations between 8 and 14 inches possible. * WHERE...In Montana, Pryor/Northern Bighorn Mountains. In Wyoming, Northeast Bighorn Mountains. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 AM MST Thursday. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Friday morning through Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult on Highway 14 through Burgess Junction. Backcountry activity will be impacted by snow and blowing snow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Travel will become difficult again Friday into Saturday with snow packed roads and poor visibility in snow and blowing snow.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.
